channel.title: [PI]Some big issue's before deadline
channel.description:
Hey so i have 3 big issue's in 1 and a alf week i am going to host my server (yep its my own deadline) but now i have 3 problems if you can help me fix it i will be really thankfull and relieved
[s]First one: My mod and admin crown is the same i just can't seem to figure this out neither won't you i think unless we use teamviewer. [/s] [s]Second : Its something with item.java i have some customs (no not retarted one's) But when i add the id's to the right one's in item.java nothing happens and i did do the thing in item.cfg so help[/s]
Third: Donating system (what i want it to do) because people ask me to explain it
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/ve10tl.jpg[/img]
when u click the green thing it brings you here
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2nh3gnc.jpg[/img]
The first icon should lock your xp and save it until you click it again no matter if you log out or not
The second one should give donaters 100% xp everytime they click it and you can't click it in wildy and only once a hour
The third one is something like a donater system you get a mystery box when u click it (when u donate for donater) and this can only be used once or if you donate 1 more time your donater right gets reseted and you can click it again
And the go back button should bring you back to equipment interface but it doens't :(
Thanks already
UPDATE: 12/7/2010
Items are fixed just need to put a shitload of items in item.java now -.- but its better than what it used to be :)
UPDATE: 11/7/2010
Crowns are fixed it wasn't hard haha i just needed to think straight i added another player right and therefore making it better for my server as it is.
Donater = p1 Moderator = p2 Super moderator = p3 Admin = p4 Owner = p5
Thanks for your help so far and get on helping me with the others :P ;)
Now i need some custom crowns :)

item.title: [PI]Some big issue's before deadline
item.dc:creator: @JavaGuru JavaGuru™
item.description:
@JavaGuru wrote:

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:64: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable donator
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator == 0 &&
donorCode1 == 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:64: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable donorCode1
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator == 0 &&
donorCode1 == 0) {

^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:65: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable p
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
p.donator = 1;
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:67: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable donorCode1
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
donorCode1 = 1;
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:68: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable donator
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
} else if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator =
= 0 && donorCode1 == 1); {
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:68: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable donorCode1
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
} else if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator =
= 0 && donorCode1 == 1); {

   ^

Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
6 errors
Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]

Alot of cannot find symbols makes me dizzy

Then changed it

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:64: illegal start of expression
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator !== 0 &
& donorCode1 !== 0) {
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:64: illegal start of expression
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator !== 0 &
& donorCode1 !== 0) {

           ^

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:68: illegal start of expression
} else if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator !
== 0 && donorCode1 !== 1); {

^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:68: illegal start of expression
} else if (playerCommand.startsWith(“test”) && donator !
== 0 && donorCode1 !== 1); {

                 ^

4 errors[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Some big issue's before deadline
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

!= means that it doesnt not equal, and donator = 0, means they are not donator. and donorcode1 == 0 means that the code has not been used.

P.S for noobs information, = means to set something, == means to check if it is set.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Some big issue's before deadline
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

tbh, your gonna have to do the paying part for yourself, so you pretty much make commands that give you donator. for example the code can be “dkfghdsahnkhfjghdfgukdas” and if thats the command you give them, and they type it in, then you put a donator = 1 in their account. I can help on it

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dkfghdsahnkhfjghdfgukdas") && donator == 0) {
p.donator = 1;
sM("you are now a donator! Thank-you for donating to ------scape");
}

and you should make a variable so the command can only be used once. so here it is:

public int donorCode1 = 0;

put that at the top of client.java

now add this to your command: && donorCode1 = 0 to the top line
so this can be your entire code:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dkfghdsahnkhfjghdfgukdas") && donator == 0 && donorCode1 == 0)) { p.donator = 1; sM("you are now a donator! Thank-you for donating to ------scape"); donorCode1 = 1; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dkfghdsahnkhfjghdfgukdas") && donator == 0 && donorCode1 == 1)) { sM("sorry, this donator code has been already used"); }

you will have to make more variables like donorCode2, donorCode3, and name them differently for the command.

Someone fix my mistakes if theres a problem

Read full topic

They load same but nothing different happens when i change it

  1. You should have a donator variable in every character file. if you do, then its easier to help and if you dont, u add one

item.title: [PI]Some big issue's before deadline

item.description:
@JavaGuru wrote:

Hey so i have 3 big issue’s in 1 and a alf week i am going to host my server (yep its my own deadline) but now i have 3 problems if you can help me fix it i will be really thankfull and relieved

First one: My mod and admin crown is the same i just can’t seem to figure this out neither won’t you i think unless we use teamviewer.

Second : Its something with item.java i have some customs (no not retarted one’s) But when i add the id’s to the right one’s in item.java nothing happens and i did do the thing in item.cfg so help

Third: Donating system (what i want it to do) because people ask me to explain it

when u click the green thing it brings you here

The first icon should lock your xp and save it until you click it again no matter if you log out or not

The second one should give donaters 100% xp everytime they click it and you can’t click it in wildy and only once a hour

The third one is something like a donater system you get a mystery box when u click it (when u donate for donater) and this can only be used once or if you donate 1 more time your donater right gets reseted and you can click it again

And the go back button should bring you back to equipment interface but it doens’t

Thanks already

UPDATE: 12/7/2010

Items are fixed just need to put a shitload of items in item.java now -.- but its better than what it used to be

UPDATE: 11/7/2010

Crowns are fixed it wasn’t hard haha i just needed to think straight i added another player right and therefore making it better for my server as it is.

Donater = p1
Moderator = p2
Super moderator = p3
Admin = p4
Owner = p5

Thanks for your help so far and get on helping me with the others
